mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.age, u.email, u.nick_name nickName, u.pass_word passWord, u.reg_time regTime, u.user_name userName FROM t_user_info u where u.id = #{id}

SELECT u.id, u.telphone, u.gender, u.password, u.token, u.user_nick_name userNickName, u.user_real_name userRealName, u.os_type_pa osTypePa, u.os_type_bu osTypeBu, u.registration_id_pa registrationIdPa, u.registration_id_bu registrationIdBu, u.address, u.user_head_photo userHeadPhoto, u.id_card_number idCardNumber, u.nation, u.id_card_address idCardAddress, u.sign_organization signOrganization, u.expiry_date expiryDate, u.birth, u.pa_user_id paUserId, u.bu_user_id buUserId FROM t_user_info u where 1 = 1 and u.id = #{item.id} and u.user_real_name = #{item.userRealName} and u.telphone = #{item.telphone} and u.token = #{item.token} and u.password = #{item.password}
